terms.definition: Pediatric Quality of Life Neuromuscular Module Version 3 Young Child - Think about how you have been doing for the last few weeks. Please listen carefully to each sentence and tell me how much of a problem this is for you: My back feels stiff.
terms.preferredTerm: PedsQL Neuromuscular Module Version 3.0 Young Child Report - Back Feels Stiff
